name: StudyDojo
headline: AI tutors for students.
description:
StudyDojo is building the AI study platform students actually obsess over.

Our platform houses pre-loaded question sets, study notes, mini-lessons guided by an AI tutor that adapts to each student individually.

generated_description:
### Overview of StudyDojo

**Website:** [StudyDojo](https://studydojo.com)  
**Founded:** 2023  
**Location:** Not specified  
**Team Size:** 5 employees  
**Y Combinator Batch:** F24  
**Group Partner:** Nicolas Dessaigne  

---

**Mission:**  
StudyDojo aims to provide AI-driven tutoring for students, revolutionizing the way they study and engage with their educational materials. 

**What They Do:**  
Initially, StudyDojo focused on creating an AI study platform that students would be excited about. Now, it has evolved into a comprehensive educational tool that offers:
- **Adaptive AI Tutoring:** Their platform includes pre-loaded question sets, study notes, and mini-lessons, enhanced by an AI tutor named Jojo. This AI tutor personalizes learning experiences based on individual student needs.
- **Study Materials:** Access to a rich library of study notes and flashcards across various subjects, enabling students to learn new concepts or revise effectively.
- **Practice Questions:** Thousands of exam-style questions that can be filtered by difficulty level and topic, all designed to simulate the examination environment.
- **Instant Feedback:** Jojo AI provides immediate grading and feedback, helping students identify strengths and weaknesses and offering strategies for improvement.
- **Mock Exams:** The ability to generate and download mock papers based on selected topics, ideal for exam preparation.
  
**Features:**
- Interactive lessons for engaging curriculum coverage.
- Extensive resources for various educational standards (IB, CBSE, A Level, etc.).
- Real-time, personalized feedback to address knowledge gaps.
  
**Community Impact:**  
StudyDojo has already garnered a substantial user base of over 310,000 students worldwide, with numerous success stories of improved exam scores. Students have reportedly increased their grades significantly, highlighting the platform's effectiveness.

**Conclusion:**  
With its smart combination of AI and user-friendly design, StudyDojo stands out as a transformative player in the education technology landscape, focusing on enhancing student engagement and academic performance. If you're looking for an innovative way to study more effectively, this platform could be worth exploring.
